physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Slightly diminished breath sounds at the lung bases, systolic ejection murmur (grade 2 out of 6), scar over pacemaker. Reflexes were 1+ diffusely; coarse resting tremor of the hands with pill-rolling movements. Psychomotor retardation, slow speech, decreased prosody, mild impairment of short-term memory, more marked impairment of executive function (Mini-Mental State Examination score: 22 out of 30).
